item.description: In SoulCollage® (an intuitive process by Seena B. Frost) we use images from magazines to create a personal deck of collaged cards that speak to our soul. We use the cards to do readings for ourselves that help us on our life’s journey, and to access our own deep inner wisdom. Making and consulting these cards is deepening for the soul while at the same time magical and fun. After some basic instruction on the four suits: Committee (inner voices), Community (family, friends, pets), Council (archetypes, spirit guides), and Companions (Animal Totems), we’ll have lots of time for gathering images and card making. We’ll also spend some time doing individual and small group activities that will help us interpret the meaning of our new cards. You’ll leave this workshop with a renewed sense of balance and creative joy… as well as some beautiful new cards for your SoulCollage Deck. Romance your own soul… and witness your own inner beauty. Cost is $59.00 until July 15. $65.00 after July 15.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: KaleidoSoul - Soul Collage
